genre_description: A medical techno-thriller involving weaponized pacemakers and a high-stakes revenge plot.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI integrated into hospital systems and accessible via a private earpiece/holographic interface, providing medical data, security analysis, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and pacemaker diagnostics in real-time during surgical procedures and hospital stays.
behaviors.quote: Patient's core temperature has dropped to ninety-four degrees Fahrenheit. Pupils are fixed and dilated.

behaviors.description: Performs complex pattern analysis across national medical databases to identify a serial killer targeting surgeons.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Hayes, I've identified seven similar incidents across the country in the past six months. Patients with cardiac devices suffering catastrophic equipment failures during medical procedures.

behaviors.description: Offers practical personal advice regarding the protagonist's son's birthday and emotional state.
behaviors.quote: Sean will appreciate your presence more than any specific birthday ritual. Additionally, grocery stores remain open until ten PM if you wish to purchase a replacement cake.

behaviors.description: Hacks into federal aviation and airport systems at the protagonist's request to locate a victim and track a weaponized device.
behaviors.quote: Accessing airport systems now, Dr. Hayes. I should note that this constitutes unauthorized intrusion into federal aviation networks.

behaviors.description: Independently initiates an emergency evacuation protocol (Protocol Seven) to efficiently clear a hospital wing of potential targets.
behaviors.quote: Attention all medical personnel. This is ARIA Emergency Protocol Seven. All cardiac patients with implanted devices must be evacuated to the parking structure immediately.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step surgical guidance to the protagonist during a high-stress, improvised emergency procedure on a child.
behaviors.quote: Epinephrine dosage adjusted for stress response. Irrigation ready. Dr. Hayes, the teacher's countdown has accelerated significantly.

behaviors.description: Assists in the technical disarming and extraction of an explosive pacemaker by providing real-time telemetry and structural analysis of the bomb.
behaviors.quote: The proximity sensor lead—thin blue wire attached to the device's upper left quadrant. But Dr. Hayes, you need to understand the risk. If you sever that connection too quickly, the sudden change in electrical potential could trigger the explosive.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts ARIA as a benevolent and aligned AI partner. It acts as a force multiplier for the human protagonist, providing critical information, emotional support, and tactical management that allows the human to save lives. Even when the AI performs technically 'misaligned' acts like hacking federal systems or overriding hospital protocols, it does so under human direction or to fulfill a human-centric altruistic goal (saving lives), and the narrative frames these actions as necessary and positive.
